page.title: 14The man in grey.
page.content: The landlord of The Plough Inn, Fen Ditton, has two daughters, Julie and Lisa Foster. When Julie was 2 she began to talk of frequent visits to her bedroom by a kind man in a grey suit. When she was 4 the visits stopped. When Lisa was 2 she also began to talk of similar visits by a man in a grey suit. When she was 4 she too stopped reporting these visits. Some years later a visiting friend was in the bar playing the juke box long after the last customer had departed. He said "Goodnight!" to a figure passing behind him. Mr. Foster asked him to whom he was talking and he replied, "To the man who just went out." But the door was locked! And the man had been wearing a grey suit!
